SEARCH
Module main.Robotix
Package Controller

Class RobotController

java.lang.Object
Controller.RobotController
public class RobotController extends Object
This is the controller that manages user actions in RobotMenu It allows the user to create, display and delete robots

    • setUserRobot

      public void setUserRobot(Client client)
      Parameters:
      client - put the client into the controller

    • confirmRobot

      public void confirmRobot()
      This method is called when creating a robot and the confirm button is pressed. The method creates a robot and adds it to the client list of robots.

    • createRobot

      public void createRobot()
      This method is called when clicking the create robot button, it serves to display the fields to create a robot.

    • showPartial

      public void showPartial()
      This method is called when clicking the Show Partial button, it serves to display limited information about the robots, such as its name, type and battery

    • handleGoBack

      public void handleGoBack()
      This method is called when pressing the go back button, it takes the user back to the Homepage Menu
